Make the most of it here with our lowdown on Valentine's Day dos and donts, first date guide, recipes to woo your significant other, beauty and fashion tricks and tips to bowl him over, and some worthwhile self-love as well. Read on!</description><link> http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/specials/Celebration-of-love-Valentines-Week-2015/entspecial/46186795.cms</link><guid> http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/specials/Celebration-of-love-Valentines-Week-2015/entspecial/46186795.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 11 Feb 2015 09:37:33 GMT</pubDate></item><item><title>World Cancer Day 2015</title><description><a href="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/specials/World-Cancer-Day-2015/entspecial/46105963.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/46109260.cms" /></a>Every year cancer kills an estimated 1.1 million people in the WHO’s South-East Asia Region and nearly 1.7 million new cancer cases are reported. Nearly 30% cancer deaths can be prevented by addressing the main risk factors - tobacco use, alcohol, unhealthy diet, physical inactivity and excess body weight.</description><link>http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/specials/World-Cancer-Day-2015/entspecial/46105963.cms</link><guid>http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/specials/World-Cancer-Day-2015/entspecial/46105963.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 03 Feb 2015 11:41:17 GMT</pubDate></item><item><title>Mother's Day 2013</title><description><a href="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/specials/Mothers-Day-2013/Mothers-Day-2013/specialcoverage/19966637.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/19967349.cms" /></a>Don't tell mommy' is, well, a thing of past. The new age mom-child relationship enjoys a democratic approach and thrives on peaceful co-existence. While some love to drag their mommies to choose them clothes and perfumes, there are others who share details of their social networking circle.</description><link>http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/specials/Mothers-Day-2013/Mothers-Day-2013/specialcoverage/19966637.cms</link><guid>http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/specials/Mothers-Day-2013/Mothers-Day-2013/specialcoverage/19966637.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 09 May 2013 08:11:18 GMT</pubDate></item><item><title>Holi 2013</title><description><a href="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/specials/Holi-2013/holi-2013/specialcoverage/19216878.cms"><img border="0" hspace="10" align="left" style="margin-top:3px;margin-right:5px;" src="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/photo/19218223.cms" /></a>Holi is the occasion to celebrate colours of life in different way.
